description: Subject matches the originator of a request, as identified by the request authentication system. There are three ways of matching an originator; by user, group, or service account.

kind.description: A string representing the kind of the subject.

serviceAccount.description: The service account of the request originator. Required when `type` is set to "ServiceAccount".

user.description: The user of the request originator. Required when `type` is set to "User".
